Articles.Content:
This is my first post to just the spacecraft exchange so here it goes....

Kerbalmen and women I present you the Kelta II. This all purpose light to medium lifter will get most of your probes to an 85x85km orbit with some fuel to spare. This download will be the rocket itself with a small Scanning satellite on top.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

(keep in mind i use mechjeb for launches since i am kinda bad at them)

-set throttle to 1/3 and blastoff(solids do most of the work here)

- travel to about 500m then tilt over to about 5 degrees and follow all the way up

-upon the first six boosters running out increase throttle to 2/3 and stage (now using three boosters)

-final booster separation increase throttle to 100% and set your obit up from their

[if you find a better way please message me and i will fix it and post your name it if you want]

Download:https://www.dropbox.com/s/rb64b8xlqxpgi7m/Kelta-2.craft?dl=0

Can't load it because it requiers a mod.

And where is the second stage or the Delta-K?

Edited August 4, 2015 by Lime
